questions.question_text:
An Administrator at Ursa Major Solar (UMS) needs to create a new user.
When creating a username, which two considerations need to be taken in to account? (Choose two.)
Which of the following are true about List Views?

choices.E: Export List View data to Excel
choices.B: Specify which groups of users have access to the list view.
choices.A: Save list views for future use.
choices.D: Follow records and view related Chatter posts.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
ABCD is correct answer as we can also Follow record from list views in Salesforce Classic
The answer is A,B,C,D
F is the correct answer.

Selected Answer: F
I don't know why but every single answer looks possible, even exporting to Excel

Selected Answer: ABC
ABC is correct.

Selected Answer: ABCD
You can test it, only Export to Excel option is not available

The statement F. "All of the above" is true.
List Views in Salesforce allow you to create custom views of data in a particular object. Here are the functions of List Views:
A. Save list views for future use: You can save a list view you've created and use it again in the future.
B. Specify which groups of users have access to the list view: You can control who has access to view a list view by specifying which user groups can see it.
C. Print list views: You can print a list view using the browser's print function.
D. Follow records and view related Chatter posts: You can follow records from a list view, and view related Chatter posts and comments.
E. Export List View data to Excel: You can export the data from a list view to Excel for further analysis.
So, all of the above statements are true about List Views in Salesforce.

Selected Answer: ABC
Related feed / posts are available once you open record details.

questions.question_text: Validation rules may evaluate an opportunity line item against the opportunity it's associated with

discussion.content: SHOULD BE A TRUE

Validation rules trigger every single time there’s an attempt to save the record. The required conditions of the rule are indicated in formulas. The formulas contain one or more criteria that should be met in order to pass verification and save the record.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar has the following environment and requirements:
✑ Critical, high-priority accounts have an assigned District Manager, Sales Representative, Inside Sales Representative, and Customer Service Representative.
✑ The Sales Manager wants to prevent these accounts from being inadvertently contacted more than once on the same day.
✑ The Sales Manager wants to report on various customer interactions.
How should the Administrator fulfill these requirements?

discussion.content: For Customer Interactions, shouldn't D option also be selected? it seems to be right

choices.B: Enter comments into the Notes section on the Account.
choices.D: Post customer interactions in Chatter on the Account.
choices.C: Log a case on the Account.
choices.A: Log a separate Task, Call, or Activity on the Account.
